main event: A sighting of 4 or 5 unidentified flying objects with red and white lights was reported on 20 November 1954 in Beaumont, Texas.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 3 to 5 minutes., The objects were initially described as trailing red and white lights., Observers noted a light traveling southwest while others moved northeast., The objects were analyzed and were probably unidentified balloons., The weather was clear during the sighting, with good visibility.
sighted object: 4 or 5 unidentified flying objects with red and white lights
